full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
### Expression of Interest (EOI) details

* **Title:** Laboratory Centrifugal Mill
* **Reference number:** PW-22-01010012
* **Publication date:** October 13, 2022
* **Closing date:** November 22, 2022 (16:00)
* **Amendment:** 1
* **Amendment date:** November 3, 2022
* **Notice type:** Request for Proposal

### Bidder Information

* **Seller name:** [Must be a registered bidder]
* **Trade agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of delivery:** British Columbia

### Description of Requirement

Natural Resources Canada requires the provision of one laboratory centrifugal mill and 48 months of technical support. The delivery of the following must be included with the bid:

* Manuals
* Documentation with technical specifications, installation requirements, and operating instructions

The requirement will be awarded based on the mandatory technical criteria and the price. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluation price will be recommended for award. The price will be evaluated in Canadian dollars, excluding applicable taxes, and including all duties and taxes.

### Bidder Eligibility and Requirements

* Must be a registered supplier on the E60PV-19EQUI supply arrangement
* Must meet the mandatory technical criteria
* Must provide 48 months of technical support
* Must include the required documentation with the bid
* Applicable taxes and duties paid in full

### Tendering Procedure

* Interested suppliers must submit a request to be on the E60PV-19EQUI supply arrangement
* Only registered suppliers will be invited to bid
* The requirement is open to all registered suppliers from October 13 to November 22, 2022

Download the attached documents or visit the link [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/13/2a004adb33a1f022243fe9da61020f7a/npp_5000069086.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/13/2a004adb33a1f022243fe9da61020f7a/npp_5000069086.pdf) for more information.

- Rephrased some sentences to improve clarity
